General.Name: Novo Resources Corp
General.Description: Novo Resources Corp., together with its subsidiaries, engages in evaluating, acquiring, exploring, and developing natural resource properties in Canada and Australia, and the United States. The company primarily explores for gold deposits. Its flagship property is the Beatons Creek property located in the Pilbara region of Western Australia. It also holds interest in Nullagine Gold Project located in the Pilbara region of Western Australia. The company was formerly known as Galliard Resources Corp. and changed its name to Novo Resources Corp. in June 2011. Novo Resources Corp. was incorporated in 2009 and is headquartered in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 580 Hornby Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6C 3B6
